lines.text: Why don't you go out and help the others?
In this cold wind? You think I'm crazy?
Bill - are we going to die here?
Something I learnt up there, from other people - to do something for someone else...
Yes we all have that feeling for a while, but it doesn't last, that's the trouble. You break your journey, it's a nine-days wonder, then everything goes on just the same.
Not quite the same - some of us will remember.
